structure.unit: Jurisdiction And Emblems Of The Commonwealth, The General Court, Statutes And Public Documents

law.catch_line: Authorized Number Of Certain Legislative Employees
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] The number of chief general court officers, assistant chief general court officers, general court officers and pages of the senate and of the house shall not exceed ninety-two in all. Chapter 3: Authorized number of certain legislative employees [ Text of section as amended by 2012, 165, Sec. 4 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137. For text effective until January 1, 2013, see above.] The number of chief general court officers, assistant chief general court officers, general court officers and pages of the senate and of the house shall not exceed 92 in all.
